description: This file defines a SearchFragment class for an Android TV application, managing a search interface optimized for TV DPAD navigation. It includes UI setup for keyboard and results grids, handling user input, showing search results, and integrating with data sources for videos, favorites, and recent searches.

classes.name: SearchFragment
classes.description: A Fragment that provides a TV-optimized search interface with keyboard input and video results.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the layout for the SearchFragment.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Initializes stores, UI elements, and sets up keyboard and results UI after view creation.

methods.name: setupKeyboard
methods.description: Configures the keyboard RecyclerView with keys and key event handling for navigation.

methods.name: setupResults
methods.description: Sets up the results RecyclerView with grid layout and key navigation to keyboard.

methods.name: buildKeyboardKeys
methods.description: Constructs the list of keyboard keys including alphabets, digits, and special keys.

methods.name: onKeyboardKeyPressed
methods.description: Handles actions based on key pressed on the keyboard, updating the search query or performing actions.

methods.name: applyBackspace
methods.description: Removes the last character from the search query.

methods.name: renderQuery
methods.description: Updates the displayed search query text.

methods.name: updateResults
methods.description: Performs a search operation based on the current query, updating the results list.
